subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Luke Ravenstahl, the mayor of Pittsburgh, has made a ceremonial effort to change his name to Steelerstahl, to show support for the Steelers as they face the Ravens on Sunday.
snippet: Luke Ravenstahl, the mayor of Pittsburgh, has made a ceremonial effort to change his name to Steelerstahl, to show support for the Steelers as they face the Ravens on Sunday.
